resources.string: Cubix Timer is an app dedecated for solving the Rubik’s cube. In this app, you can learn how to solve different types of cubes, measure and improve your solving time using a timer, and track your progress using statistics. The application is intended both for people who don’t know how to solve a Rubik’s cube and want to learn, and for people who solve a Rubik’s cube at a professional level and are interested in improving.
